# MTLFeatureSet.iOS_GPUFamily4_v2

**Case**

The GPU family 4, version 2 feature set for iOS.

## Declaration

```swift
case iOS_GPUFamily4_v2
```

## Discussion

This feature set corresponds with Apple A11 devices running iOS 12.

## iOS GPU family 4

- **MTLFeatureSet.iOS_GPUFamily4_v1**: The GPU family 4, version 1 feature set for iOS.
